name: The Faceless Ones
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D RPG in the style of Black Home and Ashes of Immortality.

Gualtier, Eidora, Cazis and Hyndla. Four of the most capable warriors in the Kingdom of Abrujah. Under the command of Queen Berenice, they are about to commence a journey that will change their lives forever, if they fail, the world is doomed.
The Faceless Ones are a sect of masked individuals, tied to the powers of the dark, they seek to bring forth an evil lord, their master, Moldark. Once imprisoned by the King for his wrong doings, he now seeks to return to finish what he had started.

FEATURES

  • Beautiful Artwork
  • Big and the detailed sprites
  • A semi-open world experience
  • Autosave feature
  • Mouse support
